org.apache.ignite.ml.math.distributed

Class CacheUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.distributed.CacheUtils
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockMatrixStorage, SparseDistributedMatrixStorage

    public class CacheUtils
extends Object
    Distribution-related misc. support. TODO: IGNITE-5102, fix sparse key filters.

        public static <K,V> double sum(String cacheName,
                               KeyMapper<K> keyMapper,
                               ValueMapper<V> valMapper)
        Type Parameters:
        K - Cache key object type.
        V - Cache value object type.
        Parameters:
        cacheName - Cache name.
        keyMapper - KeyMapper to validate cache key.
        valMapper - ValueMapper to obtain double value for given cache key.
        Returns:
        Sum of the values obtained for valid keys.

      • fold

                                         IgniteBiFunction<CacheUtils.CacheEntry<K,V>,A,A> folder)
